trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time your GE Dishwasher detects that you have 10 pods left in stock.
This Trigger fires every time your GE Dishwasher senses that your filter needs to be cleaned.
This Trigger fires when your GE Dishwasher senses that you need to add rinse aid.
This Trigger fires when your GE Dishwasher detects a leak.
This Trigger fires every time your GE Dishwasher finishes a cycle.
